Институт функционирует в составе Федерал: The Institute operates as part of the Federal Service for Hydrometeorology and Environmental Monitoring.
Важным направлением деятельности институ: An important direction of the institute's activity is complex hydroecological studies of large water systems and water management facilities. Their main goal is to assess the current ecological state of the most important water systems of the country and develop measures for the rational use and protection of their water resources.
